I tested them with three different phones and a laptop and no sign of life what so ever...seller was nice. they sent the return label and refunded my money but they did that after receiving the returned product which meant I had to delay buying replacement till I get my money back.

I love the battery life,and the design allows them to sit in your ear comfortably.atm my only gripe has been the fact that there are no substitutes for turning the wing tips into locking hooks to keep it in ear.i do love the ambient sound feature as I can pause/use it to ear what I need to and use the shortcut feature to turn it of and enjoy what I am listening to.plus having an eq in the wearable app definitely allows a better way to enjoy the sound.while not the best in audio.so far all other features have been great.even the case is surprisingly tiny and yet you get so much battery life from the buds and the case.

Worked great until the right earbud quit working 19 days after the return window closed. Amazon told me to contact Samsung. Samsung customer support told the contact Samsung customer support and then hung up.Amazon customer service did reach out and allow me to return the no -wotking buds.

Think about a great wearable for your phone, this is one. I can easily make calls and hear myself and the person clearly (you have a bunch of options to make de ambience sound better)Also the sound for music it's pretty good too, and the fact that you can easily choose what to do with each side (like open spotify directly, etc) it's pretty great

The only issue I have with these is that it hurts if you have them for a while and when i would go run it would cut off and that's why i returned them when i would be walking normally they would cut off too I'm disappointed i really liked these
So I am coming from jabra 65 to these. Big difference,1. The fit, fit way better than the 65 jabra, these are lighter and more pushed in, makiing them more comfortable.
I figured that these would be decent for listening to music while exercising.I'm wrong. Sound quality is poor. I mean - POOR, like wow I wasted my money buying these.

This was probably the best purchase of the year. The headphones themselves are very nice and the case is good quality. They pair really well with my galaxy s10 plus and the sound is amazing. It does not have completely canceled sound although it's ambient mode on the app is awsome. So far no problems and I would recommend purchasing especially if it comes with a charging case bundle.

So far I love these things! Still playing with them and trying to find the right fit for me! Its really important to me to be able to hear my audio books when I'm in public so far I think between the 3 pairs of blue tooth wireless buds these are the right ones for me! But the  Ultimate test will be when I take the bus and train to work.... ü§î. The only thing that worries me is that they're so heavy... the earbuds themselves! I use earbuds for everything from casual listening to mowing and these are the best I've ever had. The quality is great, the battery life is insanely great, cleaning is easy and even the galaxy wear app works well with it. The only thing I wish it had was more customizing on the tap and hold function, but this is extremely minor.

These are great. I love the Red, the charging case is great, everything needed is included with the purchase. Sound quality is good. It comes with multiple customization options to suit any type of ears. I've had no issues with them staying in my ears, and bluetooth is easy to set up. I've yet to use them for calls so I can't really cover that yet. Battery is great on these.
They fit well, the background noise option is great. Connects directly with Samsung Gear. Like the sound and talking quality. Also connects to laptop with bluetooth for online meetings.

I used to have JBL free earbuds and the battery life on those was terrible. I switched over to the Samsung Galaxy Buds and it was a game changer. The battery life is about 8 hrs . I drive for a living and battery life is important because it helps me communicate with customers and staff while freeing my hands. Another upside is that each earbud has its own microphone, so if one of the earbuds die you can switch over to the other one. It also comes with its own portable charger to have an even longer battery life.

The buds are ok. Battery life is great. Few issues. They do not get as loud as I like and thats probably for the best, I am half deaf now lol. That has to do with the lack of noise cancellation. The main issue is the buds drop connection randomly and don't connect correctly all the time to the phone. Also when I'm watching tv or a movie the buds sometimes become staticky and the audio bounces back and forth between buds.

Bought these for my husband as he is a UPS driver, love that they stay in your ear and the noise canceling is great however the sound quality is terrible they are very staticky and if I call him or he answers a call he can‚Äôt hear anyone clearly and all the other person hears is static.

Small and quote comfortable, sound quality is good. Would've preferred pairing process to be something like airpods where you do don't have to wear them to pair.Battery life is good, microphone quality surprisingly good. Love the blue color

Bought a set for my wife and our son. They both love them and use them constantly. The fact that they use them all the time speaks volumes. They love the look, the feel, the features and the quality. I would absolutely purchase again.Oisin

I replaced the first version samsung buds, the gear iconx 2018 version with these, and i am blown away by the improvements made. the one and only thing i miss from the old version was the ability to swipe up or down to adjust the volume, but there is a feature to double tap the edge that takes over, but this requires you to have both buds in to perform bot up and down as the right is up and left is down vs being able to do it all from either bud, but the battery life alone is worth this sacrifice.

Returned my previous pair because the battery died too quickly. With these I can go many hours before recharging. Initially I found that one hurt my ear but I‚Äôve found a better position. Only complaint is that they‚Äôre tricky to get out so If someone is trying to get my attention it takes a few seconds to free my ear.

Very undepensable connection to my LG TV. Got them for watching TV while wife sleeps. Lack of connectivity finally got to be too much, so I'm gonna give the Anker product a try. Samsung product is going to the yard sale junk pile. Expected better from Samsung.
My galaxy buds "plus" gets barley 7.5 hours of playtime before I have to charge so their 11 hours is all lies I'd settle for the first gen they're cheaper with the same battery life
If you really are into a good quality sound from your earbuds these are not for youSo Unimpressed

Great earbuds. Amazing control features if you have the galaxy wearable app. Used them for mountain biking, running, and the gym.  They stay in the ear and have an ambient sound option so you can listen to your surroundings while in use.

I would give this a zero stars if I could. I ordered this used but like new condition.They don't even charge! We received them at 10% battery life after charging them for over 30 minutes they drop down to 8%. We spent over $80 to receive an item that doesn't even work.

I purchased these mainly for the microphone and ambient noise setting. They sound great, microphone is clear and fit very comfortably. Highly recommend them to anyone looking for a high quality pair of ear buds without spending hundreds.
Did all the resets and reinstalls, the. Support told me to do it again... still didn‚Äôt work.I want my money back!!!

Compared to AirPods, this is so much better. I love that there‚Äôs an app where you can control some things like equalizer, the ambient sound. I love using them. I also love that you can turn off the touchpad because the buds respond to a tap really fast which is nice when you‚Äôre working out but not when you‚Äôre laying down. I also like how secure the buds fit in my ear. All in all it‚Äôs a great product that has a fair price. The only thing I don‚Äôt like about it is how it looks. When I look at the buds in the mirror they just looks weird. Not as cool looking as the AirPods.
I tough it going to to be a good deal.I have to returned it because the sound it is mediocre my 40 dollar Ikanszi sound way better.

I can‚Äôt put into words how satisfied I am with these ear buds. All the extra tips makes for a snug fit no matter the size of your ear. The sound quality is excellent, and all the options available for personalization through the app is an extra bonus. I love the ambient sound setting, I can wear these at work and enjoy the music/podcasts I love and still be attentive to people needing my attention, and I imagine these would be a benefit to athletes as well. They synced with my phone without any issue, and All in all they‚Äôre completely hassle free!

Everything about these were great! Until I started having overheating and then battery issues with the left earbud. It no longer holds a charge. If the left earbud is left inside the charging case, it completely drains the case trying to keep itself charged. Once fully charged, I'm lucky if I get 1hr of usage out of it.Is there a way to get a replacement thru Amazon for this?

Great sound, but if you're looking for noise cancellation specifically, you're better off looking for another set of buds with noise cancellation. The features on the Wearable app are good to play around with to best suit your preferences. Ambient Noise is super useful, but can sound a bit "tinny" if that makes sense. What's most impressive about these is the battery life. After almost 3 weeks of usage, my battery life has not gone below 70% even with extended periods of usage. It may feel uncomfortable to wear at first, but the different wing-tips and buds that come with the package can be switched to best suit you.

I'm gonna give it a 3. It's great for music but the entire reason why I upgraded is for the better mic quality yet people still have trouble hearing me with these on. Unsure if it's a connection issue or I have a bad pair but take my review with a pinch of salt.
I would have hoped for the price that the sounds quality would be better.  It is fine for phone calls but not great for music; and I am no audiofile...

Can‚Äôt get both ears to work haft the time sound like your in a barrel the battery base only last one day didn‚Äôt even talk about him much the first two days I use it still was Dad both days earpieces also does not stay connected to the phone can‚Äôt get it to respond by touch like it says I would not recommend these headphones whatsoever I will buy Bose again

So glad to see these were on Amazon. Our son wanted the new Galaxy buds when they came out and right b fore his birthday they came out in RED!! The color is beautiful. The sound amazing. And even the case is pretty. Very happy with our purchase.
Ok no for meearbud bother to much in my ears

These Comply earpieces say on the package "made exclusively for Galaxy Buds" but they do not fit the Galaxy Buds+ at all even though Amazon description says they do. These foam earpads are so loose they fall right off and are unusable.

Just recieved mine and my husband's pair in the mail. Sound quality and noise cancellation is great. Can't say much about battery life due to just receiving them in the mail. Weird, we placed order at the same time on one account but my pair came with usps around 12pm. And his came through something called Dynamex and 5pm. Fits Great! Sound by AKG is Fantastic.Up Grade from old hands free device with AKG Technology 10yrs ago. I enjoy the WEAR App. Hope it up Grades when need so I don't lose the Apps Option. Which has happened to (Sampson Buds first Gen?) buyers can't access the App.

I am really enjoying my earbuds, they make the world of video conferences much more tolerable.  I learned that it is important to keep my device, the case and me in close proximity during use.  I wish the case held its charge a little longer, it goes faster than I anticipated.
Some of the best headphones on the market. Works great on iOS and Android. Definitely worth the price especially compared to competitors.

I use these while working and am talking to the same person for about 8 hours a day. 1 bud will last a solid 6 1/2 hours before having to switch. I have to say that is way better than the air pods for iPhone as I had those when I had an iPhone 11 max pro. The bass in these are great if in the ear properly. The noise cancelling does great and the fact that you can turn on ambient sound with a Samsung is great so I can hear the sound around me even with the noise cancelling. Overall great and better than air pods.

I sit here. 2130 on a Monday night. I get my first pair of REAL headphones that I've researched for 2 months. I haven't bought a good pair in over 3 years. I finally buy these pair and they are superbly comfortable and have great sound and ambient noice cancelation. I run and go to the gym everyday. For some of you "loud" listeners they might not be "loud" enough for you but you won't hear 6 rhinoceros' having an orgy beside you.

Had them for a few months now and they have been great. Except I find when I go sit out in the sun, the left earbud starts beeping after a few minutes and I can't get it to stop. Only time this happens is when sitting out in the sun, and it isn't even that warm here in NY yet . Seems to be an overheating issue..

Great all around - except for the missing active noise cancellation - but I'd like to be able to use my google assistant when the phone is shut off. That's not something with the buds, though. Alas, great buds. They fit snuggly, and have a lot of features.I suggest going into Lab>and turning both on. To use the volume up and down on rim features, simply double click behind your ear.
I'm an Arizona contractor, bought these for work. I found out they're pretty much useless when it gets hot. They make an annoying chirping noise, maybe good for one hour in my world.

Way better and slicker than AirPod Pros. They sound better they last longer they fit better and are smaller. The price it better. Just the noice cancelling isn't but i get enough noice cancelling just having then in.

I sweat more than anyone I know but they work great even with an ipx2 rating. They only started beeping once when I took them into the sana for the 3rd time I stopped using them in the sana at least until I get a backup pair
Either defective or a complete lie from Samsung. The IconX had better sound quality then these and the supposed 11 hours of music streaming i got about 5 out of it.

I love everything about these buds but the only problem and the most important part of an earbud, is that they stay in your ear, these do not stay in very well. It might just be my ear shape but it's still highly disappointing considering the sound quality is amazing.
lightweight, comfortable, comes in different colors, stylish buds and caseGreat sound

Good ear buds ....As a jumpy person I am, Stood underneath horn at work...Was listening to music and horn went off.....No Happy Dance. Horn didnt faze me.Good sound quality . Just got them date of this review so haven played much with settungs...

Wow i also got the original and this one both are awsome, their is no such thing as noise cancelation it just minimize the amount of sound u can hear, great call quality and battery power last about 20hrs for a full discharge.

I was very skeptical about this but it turns out I was wrong. I can use this all day at work and still have battery left in the case. It syncs very easy to my phone but than I am using samsung phone.  The bass is perfect for me.  I use the larger seal vs the one that came with it.

they have great sound quality and I like how you can set them up to your liking with the Samsung app. I never have a work out or bike ride with out them and they absolutely beat the price you'd pay for Air Pod Pros

I like using these ear bud for work because I can use the ambient mode to hear whats going on around me and still listen to music. I would never use them for at home though. The buds don't stay in my ear very well and the sound quality is not very good. If you want good ear buds I would go with Bose, they have amazing sound quality and are built very well.

Great product. Do no use at the gym or if you are running. Died after 3 months b/c of sweating at the gym. Went back to my cheap water resistant buds. Sounds quality blows the others out of the water, but not if they don't work b/c you want to workout

I got the "acceptable" galaxy buds plus. I didnt mind the imperfections on the outside even the little bit of earwax left behind from my pen pal. You would think the quality control was held to a higher standard. That's the second pair I bought that were broken my first pair were tranya 360s pro and the right earbud didnt work at all with that.

Best üëÇ earbuds I ever purchased. Usually have a hard time finding the correct size tips. Not with these. Found the correct pair and  they provided a nice snug fit which improves low frequency bass. HAPPY üòä Noise cancelation is amazing. Thanks Samsung and AKG for an amazing job!
Purchased as a gift for my husband, he loves them.

Battery really does last all day. After about 6 hours of use at work I still have 40% battery remaining and that's with having the earbuds and my phone at full volume.  Ambient mode is pretty cool too if you need to hear things going on around you but if you have your music loud then you still wont be able to tell what people are saying. The music and voice just kinda mix together.

Great sound, and features. Using touchpad takes some getting used to but once you over come the learning process you're off and running! Good and secure in the ear, very comfortable, comes with different size earpieces and in ear retainers. I've fallen asleep with them in. Great buy.

I tried one of the cheap knock-offs and Windows kept dropping the connection.  These Samsung have a flawless connection.  They fit well, without looking too big on camera.  I use them for Zoom calls.  Perfect.

The earbuds themselves are great. Not as loud as I expected but the bass and quality are great. The ambient feature works awesome so I can use them with work. Earbud battery lasts about a day. The pack itself seems to need about 2 charges per day with heavy daily use. Great set up for us Android users!
I don't like the design. After a few months, I realized that it looks weird and bulky. It's just an appearance review.But it does do what it's supposed to do. The sound quality is quite decent.

These buds have poor connections to my Android phone.  Thus is my second set -- returned the first pair. Great sound, easy pairing, excellent battery life, but walking with phone in pocket the sound gets sketchy and devalues my listening enjoyment.

I use these on my job which is very loud. The noise canceling feature is awesome. Much better than I thought it would. I can listen to my music crystal clear and phone calls while I  run chainsaws and large machines. The ambient sound works really well especially when turned all the way up i can hear birds and crickets really clear and from really far away. The only con is that it could use just a little more volume but considering how good they sound it makes up for it.

I had mine for a while. My gf has an iPhone 11 and used them at night. She couldn't find a pair that fit her ear and wouldn't fall out. These were the first pair that didn't! She ordered her own pair for herself. Works great with iphones

I've wanted some bluetooth earbuds for awhile now, I decided to pull the trigger on these. I opened them up and tested them around the house and they worked great! However, when I go outside they skip and lag like crazy, if I move my head they skip, if I put my phone in my pocket they skip. I can leave my phone in a different room inside and listen in a completely different room and they work perfectly. I tried multiple fixes (everything is up to date) but nothing seems to work. I will be returning them and going back to corded headphones.

1st time galaxy bud user saw these just came out . Girlfriend has the air pods pro didnt like the feel of half in the ear style . These are freaking awsome sound quality is great l, noise isolation is pretty cool and works well . App is great and easy to use and also has a iOS app. Fits perfectly in ear lots of sizes for ear and winglets.  Love them the price point is perfect battery life is incredible love them

I use my Galaxy Buds+ daily while attending virtual meetings and the sound quality and battery life is second-to-none and lasts an entire day. The device also seamlessly pairs with my Samasung Galaxy S20+, iPhone 8 and computer making it very easy for me to switch between all three devices depending on the call or virtual meeting.

Amazing sound quality!! The ambience noise that allows you to still hear the noises around you really makes it seem like you're not even wearing headphones when there's no music playing. The case is incredibly compact and has a very slick design. The headphones themselves fit almost perfectly in my ear with just the stock gummies. They have about 11 hours of play time per ear for audio, which is fantastic. These are the best headphones I've gotten, and offer a customizable equalizer on the app as well. 10 out of 10 would recommend, have only had for 2 days.

They're not Bose, but they sure get the job done!  They sound great and don't hurt my ears.  They don't fall out.  Several fit options to use.  Love them with my Note 10+ and my computer.  Great for Zoom calls and my favorite color is RED!

The sound quality is great but every time I make a phone call the person on the other end can't hear me well and I have to take them out and use my phone instead. Also, these will not connect to my laptop or surface go. If I would have known that I would be having these issues I wouldn't have bought these ear buds

Omgoodness so beautiful love the color and quality. Little tricky to get use to at first but once you get the hang of it, it's so bliss. Calls are crisp and clear. Love that I can adjust the sound. Stays charged longer than I expected.
SAMSUNG love your Buds+.  However the ones I received from Amazon Warehouse were defective.  The left ear Bud would not charge so I returned them.  Hoping to buy again somewhere.

I have always wanted ear buds but didn‚Äôt know which ones I wanted and I didn‚Äôt want to spend a fortune. These are AmAzing and the sound is good, they are comfortable in my ears. I‚Äôm so glad I bought them. Highly recommended.

sound quality kinda sucks for the price. Also after having them for a month one bud suddenly dropped in volume about 75%. Checked around online and it seems lots of people have this issue and Samsung doesn't have any answers.

These earbuds are worth the price. The sound is clear and fresh. The battery life is great depending on the user. I had my earbuds in my ear watching a movie on Netflix on my phone falling asleep mind you the battery life was around 95 percent. I woke up the next morning the earbuds were on 70 percent and I got through I whole day without charging it.

I can't believe for $150 the left bud has no function whatsoever. It does not charge, it does not get detected by the phone. Honestly this would not happen with an Apple product. I don't want to go through the warranty process. I want an item that works out of the box. 0 stars if I could.

I was do disappointed in the originals after moving from Iphone to Samsung this past year.  I couldn't believe as a business professional how bad the voice quality was.Thoroughly impressed with these.  I am going to convince my Apple friends to get these instead of the pros (they probably won't listen).

The sound quality is very good but you cannot be more than about 6 ft from your phone and they disconnect...  I got them so that I would not have to have my phone with me as I move around in my house but I cannot go from one room to another without them disconnecting.... :(

The audio quality is a little lacking compared to other brands, especially the bass.  However, the battery life is what makes this product perfect for me.  With a two hour commute to work these get me through perfectly.

Sadly the life is still not that great. I had them on, idling, and it lost 4% listening and doing nothing. The sound quality is better than the first version. Also I love the noise cancellation. I upgraded just for this purpose. I am still trying it out, but so far it works great and I love the color.

I either got a defective product or these are just not good. I was using them fine for 3-4 months and then it wouldn't stay connected to my phone (a Google Pixel 2). I would be on a call and then it would disconnect. I'd reconnect and it'd happen shortly after again. I tried restarting, resetting, updating both the phone and the earbuds (the phone syncs fine with other bluetooth headphones/buds). It seems to be a problem with the earbuds.
Great sound and comfortable.

Sound and Battery life are great when the product is functioning.The first pair arrived DOA with the left earbud, and the second pair had the left earbud go out at the 5 week mark. Now that I am 1 week passed the amazon return window, I reached out to Samsung for a warranty replacement....  Now I am looking at 2+ weeks for them to be repaired or have a replacement pair sent.

Best earbuds I've ever had. When you switched from my iPhone 11 pro max to the Samsung S 20 Ultra i still held on to my airpods while they worked i had no control of them so I switched to these glad I did not using my aipods anymore

Tried plenty of earbuds and headphones.  These i like.  One thing I like is that you can go to a previous song.  Not many of them can do that.  Sound is great.  I have a Samsung Galaxy S20 5G Ultra and it works great with it.

Didn't want to get the first bud's from Samsung but I am glad that I did wait to get the second one and looking forward to getting the next one coming fall! Battery life so much better noise cancelling awesome ambient perfect the only thing I don't like, still got to work on the sound for music, it could be better you'll see when the next set comes out in fall

One of the ear buds stopped working after only being used a few times. I only had the buds for a few months. I sent them in to Samsung and they will not repair them under the manufacturer warranty if they are purchased via Amazon. Do not buy these, because you will have to spend well over $100 to get them fixed when they eventually fail.
Unfortunately I received an empty box. Not even sure how that happens.

These Bud's are amazing. With the Ambient sound turn off, loud outside noise is minimal and regular level noise is non-existent. The paring was automatic. I pulled out of the case and my Galaxy Wearables popped up and they were ready to go

Amazing. Only thing to add is a way to adjust volume on earbuds thenselves WHILE on the phone. Only works with music for some reason and not phone calls. When you try on a call it mutes the person, which is awesome as thats not an option in settings or booklet, but it'd be nice to update it so theres a way to make both work in options.

AirPod killer! This sounds much better than AirPods Pro! Much more comfortable. They do not work perfectly with an iPhone but they work well enough for me! The high end is pristine compared to the muddied upper registers on the AirPods Pros.

Switching to these front my Gen 1 airpods and I am glad I did it. They sound amazing! And hold a charge. I've been using them since this morning and I still have juice in them. The ambient sound works very well. Definitely recommended.
Earbuds would not send a signal so they could be paired.  Sent them back the same day I received them after Samsung told me they were defective.  Very disappointing.

from an audiophile's point of view the volume level was a bit underwhelming but I have to say I was surprised at the bass these little things put out. not necessarily Earth shattering but adequate for funk and club music. I love the app and the ambient sound control, but next time give a brother some more volume! these are the best at this price range and even the next one. you don't need to spend 250 - 300 bucks.

Use it for business meetings and no distortion clarity is amazing. People say they can hear me clearly and without any background noise. Charge last for several days and charges quickly. Love this product.

I bought these after having another cheaper set of wireless earbuds and not wanting to buy AirPods these were a good alternative with great audio once i got the right tips on them. I only had them for three days before I managed to lose both of the buds themselves during my errands when i dropped the case and picked it up without checking if the buds were still there. I might think about buying another pair and getting a pouch or something i can close shut to avoid this in the future. Would highly recommend.

Purchased on February 22, 2020. Left ear bud stopped working in September and I sent it off for warranty repair. The service repair center voided the warranty due to "damage" even though it has never been dropped or exposed to water. The cost of repair would have cost $108.97. At that point I might as well buy a different pair from a different brand.

My Bose earbuds stopped charging after less than two years so I switched to Samsung.  What serendipity.  Not only are the Samsung earbuds cheaper, but the ambient sound mode and the equalizer toggle were a pleasant surprise.  Sound quality is fantastic, they are more comfortable, and I look less like Frankenstein's monster while wearing them.  Bose insists upon itself, but Samsung is a rising star.

These are awesome little buds, I was originally gonna purchase the first models but upon watching reviews, turns out audio quality wasn't so great and phone calls were horrible. I'm glad I waited till Samsung updated the Galaxy buds and came out with these Galaxy Buds+. No ANC but I feel it's not necessary because the buds+ do a good job with cancelling outside noise with the larger tips. Sound quality is good and touch controls are easy to learn.

Comparing the galaxy buds+ with only the Jabra elite 75t's. The call clarity, hear through, and ease of use is excellent. The major issue is music sound quality. There is really no range to the audio performance, it sounds muddy and lacks bass.

I own both version, and to me there no big difference in sound, only a bit clear but not was I was expecting cause the first version sound good to me. Battery life itg amazing I can go up to 3 days without charging(6 to7 hrs a day)Noise cancellation I dont use this feature but it does drain you battery quickly, and the microphone works really really! good,

I love them! The battery lasts forever! Sound quality is good enough & you can use one ear bud at a time. Only thing is that I drop one side & run it over with a bike. Now I can't update the one earbud that's still work.

Most comfortable earbuds I've ever owned! Paired with my Samsung phone and tablet instantly, and the Samsung Wear app is useful and intuitive. Sound quality is very good, but just shy of great. Battery life is amazing. Great value overall.

The left earbud stopped working. I contacted Samsung who refused to repair them because they were not manufactured in the USA. The post clearly stated US version. Seller has been contacted, & I'm waiting on a response.
These are comfortable. They sound great. The ambient audio pass though works EXCELLENT ,but can be disabled. Wonderful battery life.If you have a Samsung phone, it gets even better.
I'm a huge fan of the color and the ambient sound magnification! They sound great, fit great. Haven't worn them for very long so I can't say anything to battery life but happy so far!

They paired up flawlessly and were very easy to use, but they were extremely uncomfortable right off the bat. I tried the other wing tip and silicone covers that came with the headphones, but they all fit very awkwardly for me and were painful to use for more than an hour. I made sure to always set my music at a moderate volume, but on the second day of use, I noticed fresh blood in my left ear - NOT a great sign. Sad these didn't work out for me. General discomfort and surprise blood are both big dealbreakers for me.
Haven't had them for a month and the right side isnt working well anymore. The sound is like a whisper. Before that they were perfect.

These are the first Samsung earbuds I have owned. I love them. Every day is a little bit of a learning curve but the audio is clear and you can control the noise cancellation on your phone or other devices you are connected with.

These head phones sound amazing and are very comfortable. I'm no music and sound wiz but the best thing about these headphones is the ambient noise mode when  you can have full conversations with people around you or even just listen to the rain while listening to your music its truly amazing.

I have a low tone voice that many blue tooth mics make it impossible for people to hear me, even with yelling. These on the other hand, everyone can hear me. I also noticed I can hear everyone who I talk to on the phone and music. they fit in my ears and don't easily fall out. I love them!!

Its really great product but the only issue with it is the battery life for the left side, it doesn't last long as the right side. Now it stopped charging at all!Plus at that price I would expect something really good

When i got these, they seemed like tipical buds.  If you push the buds deeper into your ears, you can hear the bass?  That means you need to move up a size in the insert.  I ended up putting in the largest insert and the largest seal ring and oh my gosh!  What a difference!  I'm saying don't write these off untill you try the sizing veriations.  These sound great!!

I own two pairs of orginal g buds black and yellow and I love them. But I got to say the g buds + are a great upgrade with Independent ambient sound when you have one ear Bud in is fantastic and the sound upgrade is superb gotta say over all great buy for the money and a great upgrade if you looking for a slights audio upgrade and features upgrade

I love my galaxy buds, the sound quality is awesome and I love the ambient sound thing because it allows me to hear what is happening around me.  I‚Äôve been using my earbuds almost 5 months and I have a good experience with them.  A week ago I sent them to Samsung because I washed and dried the left earbud for almost 1 hour and a half in the dryer, so it didn‚Äôt work anymore, but they repaired it for free and I just received it today. It works PERFECTLY!!!!!!! I‚Äôm so happy. I highly recommend this product.

A bit pricey and was hesitant on spending the money for these. Within the past year I purchased a much cheaper set (not samsung) lasted maybe 8 months then battery was losing charge quickly.  I am definitely impressed with these. Sound quality amazing, comfort in ear is perfect and it comes with different sizes to find your perfect fit.  Noise cancellation like no other! Equalizer for your music adjustment and enjoyment. The app is user friendly and works well with my S9+. Highly recommend.

Sound quality is actually really good.  Noise cancellation is excellent and you can adjust ambient sound through app which is nice for different uses. Liked them so much bought a second pair! Battery life is the best I've seen from a bluetooth rechargeable ear pod - approximately 12 hours and they hold a charge for days when not in use!  This blue is very subtle but pretty!

I do not like the earbuds that just go in your ear. I have always had the kind that go around your neck. I took a chance buying these. The sound was fine. It worked as expected. But with it being just bus I wanted to make sure I didnt lose them or sit them down anywhere  I bought a keychain case cover to keep with me, to put them away when not in use. I thought the buds locked in to place inside the case. Then when I wanted to use them, they were gone. I guess they fall out the case. I feel it should lock close to avoid this happening.
Like everything Except it‚Äôs not waterproof .

I didn't give these much of a chance after discovering the sound quality was so poor. I would never buy these for use in any environment other than a manufacturing plant or other similarly noisy place. And then I would not expect to hear very good music.

Do not buy them yet, I bought them just to be really disappointed the left ear bud won't work it keeps disconnecting, it tried everything to fix it and nothing helped. I went onto YouTube's comment section to see if anyone else had the same problem because they all did with the originals and I wake up to three replies they all have the same issue with the plus
The sound quality was not what I was expecting from these ear buds. Very tinny. The major issue though was that the right ear bud would never charge. I returned them for a refund.

Huge improvement from last model. I use them every single day and I can tell you that these are the best ear buds I have ever owned. Upgraded sound, upgraded mics, upgrade battery life, everything about these is awesome! You will NOT regret buying these. Also the ambient sound on these Is an incredible amount better and the sound is so crisp.
I had lost I of the ear buds and when I used the feature to locate the ear bud alarm sounds  very low not enough for me to find it. I found it on the side of the couch cushion not

I bought these to use while at work, while I cook or if I am out shopping so that i dont have to hold my phone on my ear. Well, they charge up well and stay charged a long time. That is about the only thing I like about them. When I am talking the person on the other end cannot hear me. They also hurt my ear after a few minutes. I felt a headache coming on due to the pain. So, I would not buy these again. I literally only use them to watch Netlflix and hear music. I cannot really use them for a phone conversation.

I've had three different pairs of these buds that all worked at first, but ran into connection problems very quickly. Normally, these issues would be fixed through different methods such as resetting the product itself, but each time, it was not a matter of connection, but the product itself was faulty. They are not worthwhile unless the buyer gets lucky enough to get a set that actually works properly. For this user's case, they failed to deliver three times, and now I'm stuck with broken sets.

The sound quality on them is really good, the bass and treble are both on point. You can also adjust the sound quality. The battery life is amazing, I can use one bud for up to two to three day without charge.

These Galaxy Buds definitely have a better connectivity than the predecessors. The old model used to cut out when I walk with my phone in my hand but these ones only seem to do that if my phone is in my back pocket. Overall these Buds have a great sound quality and also have pretty cool features when you use the Samsung Wearables App.

I bought these mainly because of the battery life. I haven't been able to find any other wireless earphones with the same battery life. In less than 2 weeks, sound stopped coming out of the right ear bud. I bought two  pairs, and the same thing happened twice. Wasn't able to fix it.

Sound quality is amazing in terms of hearing every bit of a song's instruments and small background sounds you wouldn't normally hear but the actual volume of the buds is a bit underwhelming, not extremely disappointed but was expecting higher volume. The 1st generation of airpods has WAY higher volume but doesn't have the quality of sound as these buds so if high volume is what you're looking for these buds aren't for . Everything else is amazing though. Battery life is out of this world as well.
I spent a week researching all kinds of ear buds. I have an Android. This seemed to be the best quality overall. Love the option for ambient noise and they are comfortable to wear and don't fall out

Great headphones and all my only concern is the case battery life. It looks like the battery drains even if the headphones are at 100% battery life. I have airpods and these take over the airpods but as far as battery life on the case goes airpods beat these.

I've had these for while now.  They are comfortable and they work well.  I generally use them for audio books, videos, and phone calls.  I am really happy with them.  I feel like the noise canceling could be better, but I may have unrealistic expectations of what the noise canceling should do.

These are incredible little things. Battery lasts forever, they're comfortable, ultra swaggin, and easy to use. Ya know, I can't think of anything I don't like about them. Call quality sounds nice from both ends, too.
I am on my second pair. Paired on my Galaxy S10. Music stops after a minute or less. Returned that set.  Works on my Galaxy S5. Love the sound and battery life.
Having trouble with my SECOND pair.  I love the ambient noise..going to contact customer service..
These Galaxy Buds+ are fantastic! They have excellent sound and are so comfortable I hardly feel they are in my ears. For someone that has small ears that means a great deal in long term wear. üíñ

First time that I try these kind of wireless headphones and they're really great. Excellent sound quality and cancelation noises as well. They have a lot of functions and the battery life is more than excellent. Five stars!
these things are amazing. My wife got hers from Best Buy, I got mine from Amazon. They're the best earbuds I've ever used, and by far exceeded all of my expectations with them.
I use mine on daily walks to listen to music or audiobooks. Battery life is very long, and having the case act as a battery refilling station is nice touch. Very happy with my purchase.
These ear buds are great. They have great sound quality. These buds also fit in my ears great. They don't feel like they are going to fall out.This model doesn't completely noise cancel.
I liked the sound quality, they just wouldn't stay in my ears.
Great fit, great battery life, great sound.NOTE: You must install Galaxy wear app to use these. I didn't have it installed when I first got them and voice calls and audio cut out terribly.

Good customer service. Exchanges my buds with buds+ with no hassle and shipped the next day. More features like ambient noise, noise cancellation and touch controls works great. Battery life is good plus the added charge in the case makes for more play time. Sounds are dynamic. Mic is ok due the construction of the buds.  Also has different colors to choose from
So far ok. Quality of sounds not great. But better than delivery
battery is woo! Feels cheaper than original one, and sounds weird after a call, but battery life is amazing and is still decent in gym, plus sound quality is bomb as well for music

Second set of Galaxy Buds that I‚Äôve purchased for my husband! These are definitely an improvement from the last release (though we/he liked those as well)! The overall look, the improved durability & sound quality makes this purchase worth
Purchased mainly for use at work but find them to be great for late night TV watching so I do not disturb those trying to sleep.Works well happy with my purchase.

Possibly the best value in a product I've ever got spending 150 dollars.  You can program the it so touching the pads do everything you need to do including turning the micro phone while not listening to music allowing you to hear better than no earbuds in at all.  You put them in and they block the sound great, hold on the left one when someone tries to talk to you and you can even hear them whisper from a long distance.
The Samsung galaxy ear buds are a quality product. The sound is amazing and all of the features and things you can do with these have made it much easier for me to do things. I love them!
I LOVE THESE HEADPHONES!  I had the original buds (not +) and I loves those too, but the ambient sound is better on these and the case also charges them! A++
Poor sound quality returned it

Every review I've seen or read says the bass and sound performance are really good, but my pair is highly disappointing. The bass is very weak and the loudness is lacking a lot, I find myself having to turn them up past 80% volume all the time. Everything else is pretty good, so I must've gotten a defective pair.
They hurt my ears but if i but if i switch right to the left ear and left to the right ear its alot better so maybe they them backwards lol these tell you everything

I was a little weary about getting these because my ears are a bit small and wasn't sure they would fit but they do and they dont fall out of the ears either. I love the style and noise cancelation is great, I gave 4 stars for sound quality because the headphones aren't as loud as expected but overall worth the money.

Ordered new Samsung Earbuds+. Despite troubleshooting, the right earbud never worked. Contacted Samsung who wanted them sent them back for repairs and would contact me regarding my repair cost. Not impressed Samsung sent a defective product and want to charge me for repairs.
after using several of these,  these are great,  expensive but work well and charge fast.  Sound, both hearing and talking are fantastic with both Samsung phone and surface pro.

Most favorite purchase of 2020. I love that you can switch between noise cancelling to ambient sound amplfying with a touch of an earbud. On the highest setting of this ambient sound, it's like a sound aid! Works great as a cyclist so that I can still hear cars and other bikes. Doesn't fall off easily. Sound is amazing. Last days with out charging and I use it for many hours a day- throughout my work shift and work out.
Great fit, never an issue with sound. Never fall out. Only need to be careful if touch, sometimes pauses or skios a song, but that is settings i havent changed yet. I would definately buy again!
These are the best I have used!! If you  don't like the  cord hanging down and want the comfort of wireless, these are awesome!! Plus they  come in GREAT colors!!Thank you!!

The best part about these headphones are the battery life. I've been searching for headphones that will last more than 3 hours. Each earbud charges separately so you can charge the left one while listening to the right. The best part is that it doesn't take long to charge. My case was at 40%while my right headphone was at 25%. I charged it for at most 30 minutes and my headphone was at 60%. Definitely recommend downloading the app so you can get the most out of them. Highly recommend

Because they are so bulky they don't stay in my ears when I move around.  It is difficult for me to switch from listening to music to answering a phone call. Sound quality is good. No complaints about the battery life. Noise cancellation is good. I would not get this type of ear buds again. I'm not saying you shouldn't try them. Overall the performance is good. I just wish I could run the vacuum and be active without them falling out of my ears.
Falls out my ear all the time, no matter what size I change it to .

I‚Äôve had these since February of 2020 and today, not even a year later, I‚Äôm on the phone with Samsung setting up a repair through ‚ÄúUbreakIfix‚Äù so that they can repair my left earbud. It disconnected and has not been charging for the longest. I was going to the gym just using one ear bud to workout and obviously that‚Äôs annoying. If you do buy these, be prepared to do what I‚Äôm doing. Nonetheless they are pretty good earbuds.

Really easy to use.  Outside noise is significantly reduced. Several set-up options to include an external mic that can be toggled on and off to hear someone talking without removing the buds or turning off your music.  I have a Samsung Galaxy, which syncs immediately, but my iPad setup was a little tedious.  Had to turn to YouTube.  Once setup, though, there weren‚Äôt any problems.

Bought these on a good deal. Amazon box arrives undamaged with the Samsung buds+ box inside. The tape on the Samsung box had been cut and there was nothing inside but an instruction booklet.Amazon support was nice but said they could only refund me my money instead of sending me another pair, which sucks because I had been waiting on a good deal for these.
I also bought another pairs. Because this one is more heavier than the new one. But my husband likes it.He said it good for him.The battery can stayed more than 4 hours.

A major upgrade from the original buds, they lean on the much more bass heavy side than the original that even when EQed down in the app is very present. The battery life is phenominal and I have never had them die in a single session of listenening. They stay in very well when running and working out and the mobile app is fine enough even though it is still better than the normal buds app. It also now has IOS support with the app.

I enjoyed the original buds and these are much improved. Battery life is a true 11 hours and they are excellent for phone calls. They are even more comfortable than the others. Worth the price in my opinion.
As soon as I got them i full charged it. I put them in my ears and the left earbud gave out. On the app it said they were fully charged. $150 wasted and this is what i get. Faulty earbuds.

I am always out somewhere, these allow me to be free from wires with great sound quality.  Perfect for shutting out the lawnmower noise and they are discreet enough to be worn with out most people noticing.  Great product!
From the moment you open the charging case and put them in your ear, it's already connected!They are awesome, only con is I've hung up on quite a few calls...

I'm loving these already! Only had them about a week but so far so good. I was worried about them fitting in my ears good because of my piercings but they fit fine. Only complaint is I couldn't be heard well with all of my windows down driving. That's typical though.

I love them and use them alot ... kind of not happy  about not being  able to find find it when its lost on the ground since they say its disconnected  while not in the case . I lost one ear budd so I ordered  two .ordered sets for back up ..

Great sound quality, even though it's not advertised as noise cancelling I love the passthrough design of the microphones. Get around 4-6 hours of battery life on high and can get another 14-20 hours off the case. Love the red color. Comes with many different ear bud fits. These are very comfortable and I can wear for hours.
These Samsung galaxy buds plus are great! They are in my favorite color red. Sound quality is crystal clear for phone calls and listening to music is fun. Not to mention great battery life.
Right earphone has stop working and I haven't had the product a month yet. I need a replacement or my money back.

I should have gotten these sooner. Surprisingly good sound quality but not amazing. Ambient sound hisses and isn't great about wind noise. That said they 'just work', have usable (but definitely not all-day) battery life, and are crazy convenient for phone calls and listening to books and podcasts and such. Well worth it.

I assumed that BUDS+ would indicate BUDS plus more.  WRONG!  The health coaching in the earbuds is gone, as well as being able to upload songs to the buds for playback.  These are just bluetooth earbuds with all the great features of the 2018 version removed.
They sound amazing and the ambient sound is drastically improved!

Good pair of ear buds, when they work they are pretty awesome, sound is good but not as bass-y as I would like. Now if you go outside, and specially if it's kind of windy, prepare for an unbearable experience as the Bluetooth connection is very poor and calls are messy with tons of problems constantly that make you restart them. Would not buy again honestly. Overall, decent, but there are better options for cheaper, or just go all the way to the apple pro's.
This fit great into my ears.  I always had one of my pods drop out and I didn't want to have to pay 250.00 to have that stop happening.  I wish the sound was a little more robust but it's still great

I had them for about a week and I finally got a chance to use them. They charge fast They are comfortable and they do cancel a lot of background noise for me while talking but not for the person on the other end. They say they can hear my background more than they hear me. No good. And that it keeps breaking up. Not happy with that either
Dropped my old ones in the ocean, these plus are a definite upgrade. I like the base levels, and the battery life is amazing. Also the ambient sound mode 3 makes you have super hearing.
These earphones are great for running! They stay in ears very well and have great noise cancellation.

I don't often review products but I'm writing this so other people don't play themselves of $150. After 6 months the right earbud has decided not to connect to anything. I've tried everything I could, all youtube and google tutorials and nothing. I've contacted customer support from both amazon and Samsung but they can't help. It's a real shame because they sounded great and performed well.
I love them, they sound very good. But they can't really stay in my ears that well and ive tried all the sizes. Other than the fact they cant stay in when im doing gym stuff, id give 5 stars
High quality. I have airpods also and these sound better, are louder, and better for working out.

These earbuds are fantastic! They are authentic Samsung products, have potential for all day usage and sound pretty good. They don't have the most spectacular sound quality, but they're far from bad! What really impressed me is the comfortability, I can easily wear these all day. I would definitely recommend these to my friends and family.

They sound really good although if your a bass head it's meh, have super good battery life that you will almost never have them run out, the earbuds fit in super securely although you need to do some adjustments with the wingtip kinda hurting your ear for some people. They are definitely worth it for the price with both the quality and comfort of them.
I bought three of them for my kids. They love it

I'm an android user. I purchased the Buds this time instead of the airpods.  The sound isn't the best and I'm having a hard time answering and hanging up the phone using my buds. The battery life is GREAT,  the fit is comfortable, and they pair easily with my Samsung device.
Bought this along with the wireless charging pad and it works great! The downside is that, I have small ears and long time of using it made my ears hurt lol but the product itself is nice
A recent update made the ambient sound mode less shrill, so that eliminated my only complaint.  Everything else is awesome, and I use these constantly.
These earbuds fit so much better in ear than the airpods. No more earbuds falling out when I'm exercising! They also have superior sound and I love the touch controls! A great item!
Sounds great. Blocks out a lot despite not being noise cancelling like the AirPod Pros. Battery life gets me through a whole day and then some with the case.

I absolutely love these headphones! The sound quality is great, the noise cancellation is pretty great as well. I love the option of still being able to hear whats going on around me without having to take one headphone out. The battery life is amazing. I use my headphones just about every day,  from work calls to listening to music. I only charge my headphones maybe once every other week. I highly recommend these!
I like everything about this product! The sound is absolutely amazing!!! Best choice I made for my first set of wireless earbuds! I can't imagine anything sounding any better! Absolutely AWESOME!!!
Good bluetooth paring.Good sound.
Samsung Galaxy buds plus improved battery life significantly from am original buds, and easier to connect, shows battery indicator on the case as well , more fuller sound, and better than iPods.

I'm a true samsung fan! But... Im so disappointed in these ear buds+. They are comfortable but to sound is no better the original buds. Apple air pods SO much better. Sorry I gotta go with Apple this time.
I use these when I'm meditating or walking. The sound is awesome and when I have ambient noise on I can still hear most of what's going on around me
Better than I thought.  Pretty pricey but worth it. Noice cancellation works great,  sound quality good, soon as you open charging case Buds+  connecting automatically.
bought this for my mom and she uses it everyday. the sound is great and the design is sleek and clean. technology is top notch and battery life is good.

Since the galaxy buds came out a year ago I've owned about 5 pairs.. even though I have had so many problems I keep coming back because I love the sound, quality and fit. The buds plus are an even better version.

I have used these for quite a while now when I workout.  The sound is pretty good,  certainly adequate for my needs.  They hold a charge well and recharge quickly. My old Mifo's case held one longer but it's OK. I do like the integration with my phone and the ease of pausing, starting, and skipping music.  No one has complained about the audio when I am in the phone. They fit well and do all expected of them. And that's all I have to say 'bout that.

I am really impressed with the quality of this product. This is my first experience with an earbud like this. The fit is excellent, the sound is awesome, the battery life is outstanding and I love being completely hands free and not worrying about a cord catching a handle or corner and ripping the buds out of my ears.
These are the wireless earbuds you‚Äôve been waiting for!Take the time and read the owners learn all the settings and totally customize them to make them totally tailored to you personal liking!

I was so excited to get my buds. Until I put them in and noticed the right earbud not working. I looked on the weather app to see it greyed out as if it's not even there period, while the left works beautifully. I'm so disappointed... I've updated firmware, etc, etc... Dang it!!!

I use earbuds while I work so I need good quality with a long battery life. With these I don't have to charge them every night but every few days. They are comfortable and I like the ambient setting. The app is easy to use too.

Not one con that I can find. Just take your time trying on the different fittments for a perfect seal and seat. These things are amazing. I've had them for 3 hours and received them with 3/4 battery in each bud and only took 15 minutes and were topped off. Wonderful earbuds. Seems like they have an endless supply of powwah!! Lol. 5/5 highly recommend.

I absolutely love these. My first gen ones were great save the battery life but these go all day at work, pop them in the case for the ride home and they can go all night at home. If they sound not great move up a size for the inner ear (I know it's not the inner ear) and I promise they will blow you away! Expensive yes but worth it also yes

The product itself is really great. Easy pairing and sound is awesome. My only complaint is the way my package was delivered. Came from an Amazon delivery driver who didnt care about my package at all. I live in a big apt building and he carelessly left my package in front of someone else's door on a different floor. Not even close to my apt #. They really need to work on that!!

Amazing quality. Love the added extra features of the plus. I had the original Galaxy buds. And lost one of them. I decided to upgrade to the Galaxy buds +. Sound quality is absolutely amazing. I like the ambient noise mode. As I wear them a lot at work it makes it so I don't have to take them out to hear people around me. Battery quality is great. They stay in while I'm working out and dancing.

Great handsfree, mediocre bass quality on speakers. For earbuds which cost almost $150, I would have expected that the sound quality would be a lot better. I want to be able to really feel the bass, especially when I'm listening working out! The reason I kept these earbuds is because the handsfree for calls is excellent! And I really needed that. Overall a 3.5 star for me. If these earbuds cost $50 it would have been a 4 star.

Sound quality is actually really good.  Noise cancellation is excellent and you can adjust ambient sound through app which is nice for different uses. Liked them so much bought a second pair! Battery life is the best I've seen from a bluetooth rechargeable ear pod - approximately 12 hours and they hold a charge for days when not in use!
Purchased it for my husband and should admit that never have had such high quality ear buds.He enjoys it very much.
Best sound  Ive ever heard, better than my airpods 2020 .Amazing quality and design as well as set up and you can decide bass, trebile, boost, so happy I purchased these! Wow!
I purchased the first buds and those went back! They were so HORRIBLE! These are hands down the best earbuds I have ever owned! I am so glad I gave them another shot!!! Worth the price!
These work best with a Samsung phone, if you want them for music, they are 8 out of 10, Bose are 9 out of 10 for music. They really work best with Samsung phones

They work great and fit in my ears perfectly. I can't really hear anything outside from them and they barely feel like they're in there. They pair really easily with my phone BUT pairing them to a pc I've found some problems. The sound is broken and static is a thing and it's pretty bad, clearly not meant for pc's but when you're buying Bluetooth earbuds you expect it to be compatible with everything. Also boasts a mic yet does not work for pc gaming whatsoever.  4/5 overall 5/5 for just your phone.

These headphones are horrible, I can now hear myself sing using ambient noise, the sound quality is so awesome I can't fathom the thought of using another headphone now. Damn you Samsung for making another exceptional product.

Amazing earbuds. The sound quality is high quality and the ambient sound feature is better than I expected. A great set for those who want to listen to music or audio books as well as making phone calls.
Can't comment on the battery life as yet  but this thin is super amazing.  I am going to give 5 stars for the battery life just because this thing is so amazing

Excellent product overall. I owned the previous generation Galaxy buds and was very happy. These buds are comfortable and the battery lasts for the whole day.  The ambient noise mode allows sound in with a touch of the buds so you can listen to the environment around you without taking the buds out or turning the music off. Overall I‚Äôm pretty happy with this purchase.

Was surprised they came in this color, I've only seen them in black and in pearl colors. So the light blue was really cool color to have. I've always liked light blue as a color. I'm very satisfied with my purchase.
Blocks out my family. Love them. Sound quality is good

These little guys go above and beyond on what I expected. Great sound quality, long Bluetooth connectivity and last all day! The one thing that I'm not super partial about is the hearing your surrounding part of it, luckily it can be turned off but when it is used, white noise becomes an issue, ie; fans.
The right ear bud will not connect to my phone. I've tried every technique in the user manual. I can't get through Samsung's automated menus by phone or online to request help. What a waste of money.
Definitely an upgrade from last year's galaxy buds, better sound quality, more features and longer lasting battery! Great purchase. 10/10 would reccomend for its price. :)

After a few days of using these headphones one ear starting sounding lower then the other. I tried resetting them but it didn't do anything. if I could get this fits I like these headphones overall. Still waiting for Amazon tech to call me back to troubleshoot this over the phone.
Ear use do not stay in place in ears

Truly amazing headphones! The ambient sounds is the main reason I bought these and was really impressed! There not crazy loud but they are loud enough and have plenty of customization in the app you use with them.

Best in its class. Amazing battery life, excellent sound reproduction. They do not have noise cancellation but if fitted properly they will block most ambient noise. They have an ambient sound boost which I find make the buds work better when switched on. Buy these or the $230 Sony model if you want the best for your buck!
These headphones are my absolute favorite. Great for phone calls, music and podcasts. I even unfortunately sent one through the washer and dryer, and it survived with not a single issue.
I want my money back , it worked well for 3 weeks then  right bud decides it doesn‚Äôt want to work take charge nothing
Truly great buds in all aspects. The one thing that could improve is to make them with a different finish so they are not as slippery.
Can't hear people on the phone.  Wasted a lot of money on this product.  My wired $25 pair works better than these.  Don't waste your time.
Sound great. I like being able to wear only one at a time. I like setting the buds for hearing ambient sounds so I can wear them at work or riding my bike.

I bought this as a Birthday gift and my little brother was so excited to finally have these and he opened them and it only came with one ear bud. For $150 I would expect these things to be listed correctly. I am beyond upset and will not be purchasing from this company again if I cannot get this resolved.
Excellent sound quality. So many features and using them it is safe to use in the car and still hear what is going on in traffic. Best earbuds I have ever owned.

Love my Galaxy buds+, love them! I was going to order them for my brother but he didn't think they would be great. So I'm the family guinea pig. I must say A+++.My only issue so far is I'm going through hoops with Amazon to get my free wireless charger. Bummer.

Using the buds for a phone call the user says ‚ÄúI can not hear you‚Äù.  They come with 3 sizer rings but will not stay in my ears. Good for music and books. Use Samsung app to control the buds so they are a little awkward when using other Bluetooth connections for input.

After years of trying to find wireless buds that fit well and sound great I basically gave up until I received these. They fit so snug and the bass kicks quite nicely. The ambient sound is a little weird at first but works very well, I no longer need to pause the music to have a quick conversation. Phone call clarity is great on both ends as well.
I think these are awesome. I love that you can set notifications like text to read it to you while your working or walking so you don't have to pull out your phone and read it.

Warning, these earbuds may not work if you do not have a Samsung Galaxy phone. I have an LG phone and they will not sync with my phone. My wife has a Samsung Galaxy and it worked instantly. I have to return them and I'm very disappointed!

My first Samsung Galaxy Buds and they are awesome! I really like how easy they are to use and they sound great. Using the Galaxy Wearable app on my phone is great also showing the battery life and other features. Great job Samsung! Keep up the good work...

I like that they are small in size, I wish they had a better tip because I'm worried they will fall out when I moving alot, or sweating. I listen to audio books with and like the sound just wish a tiger fit.
Awesome headphones! I was skeptical about wireless earbuds. However, these have definitely met and surpassed my expectations especially for a lower price then some of the competitors.
These are so easy to use and comfortable. In the past I've always had issues with earbuds falling out, they stay put until I remove them

Bought this product for my birthday two months ago. Out of nowhere the left earbud had extremely low volume. Never dropped in water. Always stored in case. Yet it would cost way more than half the purchase cost to repair. Don't buy.

I love this Galaxy Buds+. Great sound, great battery live, very comfortable. I can use either left or right one. Clear voice when on my phone calls. I had the Jabra Elite 65t, they were good and had a better rating when it comes to water resistance but overall I prefer the Galaxy Buds+.
This product stands up to the Samsung name!!  I love the ambient option. I love being able to hear what's going on around me but yet my music sounds great. Wonderful job Samsung!
I am in love and terrified at the same time. In love with the quality and terrified of losing the freaking case if I take it out the house

Incase you are debating on getting wireless headphones or not. I gotta say I got just got the Galaxy Buds+ today & they rock! Very convenient since I have the galaxy s20 plus and there isn't an audio port. The buds are lightweight and comfortable to keep in my ears for long periods of time. Overall this is a very good product and I'd recommend it

When the product arrived and I tried the headphones out of box, the right ear didn't work. I freaked out and tried to return it immediately but then I charged the entire unit and it was just dead. Great product, price and delivery.

Bought these and they were perfect but one of them just doesn't connect to the case anymore.  Happened after the return window closed so I just lost $130 dollars. Airpods are superior I guess. Never getting Samsung products again

I love these earbuds, I'm gonna buy me an extra pair just in case.

it's just too bad one of the buds wouldn't connect and had to return but sound and battery life was good. tried to order another pair but someone stole it off the porch and then had trouble with amazon help.
Great earbuds and feel great in the ear! Sound better than AirPod pros but they don‚Äôt work as well with Apple iPhone. If I had a Samsung I would definitely recommend these!

I love samsung and these sound really well and work really well but I think that they should work on having a little bit more impact resistance because one earbud has gone out completely and I have ordered two sets and for the price I think they should be built a little better

everything about it is good but not the sound quality it's more of a bottle neck now I see why people get angry and phone manufacturers for removing the head phone jack because my default akg headphones that came with my note 10 sound way batter but other then that battery and noise cancelation works great would recommend for other uses like sports or if you just don't want to have wired headphones.

Great battery life. I have used with both a Samsung and an apple device and these buds have worked really well with both.
I really like these. they are the best that I have ever tried. Comfortable and stay in place.I recommend them.
THESE ARE DEFINITELY WORTH THE UPGRADE. THEY ARE AMAZING IN EVERYWAY. IF YOU DOUBT YOURSELF FOR A SECOND, DON'T.  UPGRADE FROM THE GALAXY BUDS TO THE PLUS. I LOVVVEEEE MINES

Seriously love these! I could wear them ALL day! If only my ears wouldn't build up ear wax and cause some ear issues. Other than that the battery will last me all morning and be above 50%. The sound isnt too loud but quality is nice!

I previously had the 2017 Gear IconX and I rode those til the wheels fell off so this was a welcome upgrade. Great sound and even better battery life only miss the on board storage for music when not connected to phone.

Love them.  Use them every day . Sound is great . Ambient mode is awesome. Controls work great.

After much research, I finally decided on these. Holy cow are they exactly what I wanted!!! Not only are they beautiful, fit perfect and sound amazing, they also are very easy to use. I absolutely LOVE everything about these ear buds! Held out for the blue color, battery life is unbelievable. The charger is super useful too. No brainier purchase.

there great for sound and the features are a must to have. i will say the boost and treble are not that great compared to other earbuds. but other then that i say, get em..but not for the price there asking fori say try to get them on sale.

The best Bluetooth ear buds i have ever purchased. They are incredibly comfortable and the sound quality is great. I have never had a problem with them coming out during a workout either. Great call quality and the ambient sound feature keeps me from constantly taking them in and out.

Very good sound quality. Very good features as well - 4 star for those. The biggest challenge for me was the ear fit. I tried all the combinations - still it was very lose.

Great for the first week, but a month into having these one of the earbuds loses volume completely, and I've tried everything possible to make them work, looked at tons of reset videos (and followed through acting on it), even contacted support and followed through with their instructions to no avail. say what you want about AirPods but I can go months before I get a problem out of them
